snippet: Mr. Richards was a sergeant who was demoted after video footage surfaced of him and his colleagues urinating on corpses of Taliban fighters in Afghanistan.
abstract: Robert W Richards, former Marine sergeant who was court-martialed and demoted after defiling Taliban corpses, dies at age 28.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Richards was a sergeant who was demoted after video footage surfaced of him and his colleagues urinating on corpses of Taliban fighters in Afghanistan.

headline.main: Robert Richards, Marine Guilty in Taliban Desecration, Dies at 28
